description.en: My family is in debt, and we don't have enough money for my sick sister's treatment... The troubled noble, Clarice, finds herself engaged in a political marriage with the most feared Black-Knight in the kingdom, Frost, known for "slaughtering beasts with his bare hands". In an attempt to secure the fortune, Clarice tries to seduce the "Black-Knight", but just as she does, she discovers "her" secret...
description.ja: 実家は借金まみれ、病気の妹を救うには治療費が足りない…。崖っぷちな子爵令嬢・クラリスが政略結婚をすることになったのは、「魔物を素手で屠る」とウワサの黒騎士・フロストだった！財産を握るため、どうにか”黒騎士様”を篭絡しようとした矢先、クラリスは“彼女”の秘密を知ってしまい…。
description.pl:
Moja rodzina jest zadłużona i nie mamy pieniędzy na leczenie chorej siostry...
Zmartwiona szlachcianka, Clarice, zostaje zaangażowana w polityczne małżeństwo z najbardziej przerażającym Czarnym Rycerzem w królestwie, Frostem, znanym z „zabijania bestii gołymi rękami”.
Chcąc zapewnić sobie fortunę, Clarice próbuje uwieść „Czarnego Rycerza”, ale gdy to robi, odkrywa „jej” sekret...
description.es-la:
Mi familia está endeudada, y no tenemos suficiente dinero para el tratamiento de mi hermana enferma...
La nobleza en apuros, Clarice, se encuentra comprometida en un matrimonio político con el Caballero Oscuro más temido del reino, Frost, quien es conocido por "matar bestias con sus propias manos"
Con la intención de asegurar la fortuna, Clarice intenta seducir al "Caballero Oscuro", pero justo cuando lo hace, descubre el secreto de "ella"...

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

description.en: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

title.en: I Hold the Heart of a Tyrant

description.en:
The Crown Prince’s only friend, me, Euseniel Heartland.

One day, our family was expelled from the capital for having had a bad influence on the Crown Prince. But after 14 years, we finally reunite, However,  he has changed drastically.

When asked why he changed, the Crown Prince answers that it is because he wanted to be the ideal man for me. But no, this is not the friend I used to know anymore, And it's not only his appearance what has changed, I'm sure there something else on the inside that's not the same as before. What could it be?

description.en:
Junpei Ichinose, a student at a magic school in Tokyo, is a dropout who has never discovered his magic aptitude. Suddenly, the beautiful witch Meryl appears before him and tells him, "I need your power, the reincarnation of the Demon King". Junpei finds out that he has the power of the Demon King. He learns that he has the power of the Demon King, and his secret is revealed to Sonia, a beautiful girl who is a descendant of a brave warrior. Junpei, who has no intention of becoming a Demon King, persuades Sonia to teach him how to use his power properly. However, the Demon King's power is the strongest and worst "erotic magic"!

The harem school battle to master H-magic with beautiful girls is about to begin!
description.id: Junpei Ichinose, seorang siswa sekolah sihir di Tokyo, dia adalah seorang penyihir gagal. Tapi tiba-tiba, penyihir cantik Meryl muncul di hadapannya dan mengatakan kepadanya, "Aku membutuhkan kekuatanmu, reinkarnasi Raja Iblis". Junpei mengetahui bahwa dia memiliki kekuatan Raja Iblis. dan rahasianya terungkap kepada Sonia, seorang gadis cantik yang merupakan keturunan pahlawan. Junpei, yang tidak berniat menjadi Raja Iblis, membujuk Sonia untuk mengajarinya cara menggunakan kekuatannya dengan benar. Namun, kekuatan Raja Iblisnya adalah kekuatan "sihir erotis".

description.en:
Egil, an S-rank adventurer who has lived hateful of "slave," falls in love with one slave at a slave auction he was forced to bring. She was Eleanor, the former third princess of the Kingdom of Cornelia. Eleanor, a slave to Egil, begs Egil to "kill my childhood friend who sold me to a slave trader!"  
Keep an eye on the estrus slaves if there is a chance! Can Egil rescue the body and mind of beautiful girl slaves and bring peace to this world…!
description.es:
Egil, un aventurero del rango S que ha vivido odiando a los "esclavos", se enamora de una en una subasta a la cual fue obligado a ir.   
  
Era Eleanor, la antigua tercera princesa del Reino de Cornelia. Eleanor le ruega a Egil "mata a mis amigos de la infancia que me vendieron a un comerciante de esclavos".   
  
¡Vigila a las esclavas si hay alguna posibilidad! ¿Puede Egil rescatar el cuerpo y la mente de las hermosas chicas esclavas y traer la paz a este mundo?
description.ja: 『奴隷』を忌み嫌いながら生きてきたSランク冒険者のエギルは、無理やり連れてこられた奴隷オークションでひとりの女性に一目ぼれしてしまう。彼女は元コーネリア王国の第3王女、エレノアだった。エギルの奴隷となったエレノアは、エギルに「わたくしを奴隷商人に売った幼なじみを殺してほしい」と懇願する――!! 隙あらば発情する奴隷たちから目が離せない！エギルは美少女奴隷たちの身も心も救済し、この世界に安らぎをもたらせるのか…！「わたくしを、エギル様の女にしてください…!!」
description.pt-br: Egil, um aventureiro de Rank S que viveu com ódio aos 'escravos', apaixona-se por um escravo em um leilão de escravos que foi obrigado a trazer. Ela era Eleanor, a antiga terceira princesa do Reino da Cornelia. Eleanor, uma escrava de Egil, implora a Egil para 'matar meu amigo de infância que me vendeu a um comerciante de escravos!' Fique de olho nos escravos do cio se houver uma chance! Poderá Egil resgatar o corpo e a mente de lindas meninas escravas e trazer paz a este mundo...!

description.en:
Mayo, who is gloomy and lacks self-confidence, is currently active as the bright and cheerful popular VTuber "Mahiru".

The more Mahiru, the polar opposite of his true self, is loved, the more the reality of being alone becomes painful...

Even his manager Ogino, who praises him a lot and spoils him, is probably only looking at Mahiru, not the real "me".

Because he knows this, he can't take Ogino's words "I love you" seriously and wish to be loved by him so much...!

However, as if seeing through Mayo's "desire to be bullied", Ogino asks, "Shall I bully you instead?", revealing the depths of his body trembling with anticipation...!?

A sweet, sadistic, caring manager x an unconsciously masochistic, gloomy VTuber

Development of the mind and body! Pampered Love Days!!!!

Enquanto seus colegas eram todos atraídos e domados pela oferta de sexo ilimitado com as empregadas do castelo, Yoshitsune, um herói de baixo escalão, dedicou suas habilidades de trapaça para conseguir mais e mais empregadas domésticas...

description.en:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
description.ja:
任務に失敗した暗殺者が転生したのは、公爵令嬢のセレナ。「私は元暗殺者。なりすますなんて簡単だ」そう思っていたセレナだが、 頭がお花畑な母親や、彼女を蹴落とそうと周りを欺く義妹などとの感覚のズレに日々いら立ち、生きづらさを感じていた。 
マウントだらけのお茶会に、愛憎ドロドロな学園生活……周囲からの嫌がらせを冷めた目で痛烈にかわしながらも、その冷徹さゆえに疎まれ孤立していくセレナ。 そしてある日、義妹が第二王子と婚約することを知り、ついに家出を決意する。しかしそこに第一王子のエヴァンが現れて--!?
愛を知らない元暗殺者が貴族社会を突き進む、異世界転生コメディときどきラブ!？

description.en: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!

altTitles.ja: 先輩VS後輩ちゃん
勘違いされる後輩ちゃん

description.en: A Kouhai wants to tease her senpai, but she has a weak defense.

title.en: Shi ni Modori Oujo wa Ikinobiru Tameni Yuri Harem wo Tsukuru Koto ni Shita

altTitles.ja: 死に戻り王女は生き延びるために百合ハーレムを作ることにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinimodori Oujo wa Ikinobiru Tame ni Yuri Harem wo Tsukuru Koto ni Shita

altTitles.en: The Death Defying Princess Creates a Yuri Harem to Survive

description.en: Marie, a domineering and selfish princess, faced her end under the guillotine's blade after her subjects had enough of her. But instead of staying dead, Marie finds herself back a year in the past, though no matter what she does she can never escape the fate that awaits her in a year. Eventually, after Marie learns that the only way to escape her own execution is to conquer a large swathe of 'romantically troubled' women, she decides to use her own 'royal charisma' to build a yuri harem!
description.ja: 独裁ワガママ王女のマリーは、国民の反感を買い、ギロチンで処刑されてしまう！かと思いきや、一年前に戻っていて、何度やっても死んでは戻るを繰り返すマリー。処刑エンドを回避するためには、「女難」となる無数の女を攻略しなければならないと知ったマリーは、持ち前の”カリスマ性”を駆使し、百合ハーレムを築き上げることを決意する!

altTitles.ja: 理想のヒモ生活

description.en: One day, average salaryman Yamai Zenjirou has an out-of-this-world experience—literally! He's pulled from Earth and dragged to another world where magic thrives and a gorgeous, powerful queen needs a consort. Now he's being pressured to marry that very monarch and help her bear a child. Will Zenjirou accept this life of lazy, luxurious love at the cost of leaving his home behind?
description.ja:
**異世界で巨乳の褐色女王とグータラ生活！？？**

月平均残業時間150時間オーバーの半ブラック企業に勤める山井善治郎は、気がつくと異世界に召喚されていた。善治郎を召喚したのは、善治郎の好みストライクど真ん中な、褐色の爆乳美女。「ようこそ、婿殿」と、いきなり結婚を申し込む異世界の女王様に善治郎の出した結論は……。 サラリーマンが異世界の王族となり、ぐーたらなヒモ生活を謳歌!? 「小説家になろう」で年間ランキング1位を獲得した人気作が待望のコミック化！
description.pt-br: Um dia, o assalariado médio Yamai Zenjirou tem uma experiência de outro mundo - literalmente! Ele é retirado da Terra e arrastado para outro mundo onde a magia prospera e uma rainha linda e poderosa precisa de um consorte. Agora ele está sendo pressionado a se casar com aquela mesma monarca e ajudá-la a ter um filho. Zenjirou aceitará esta vida de amor preguiçoso e luxuoso ao custo de deixar sua casa para trás?

title.en: The 53 Year Old Online Gamer's First IRL Meet-Up

altTitles.ja: 53歳で初めてオフ会に参加しました

altTitles.ja-ro: 53-sai de Hajimete Off-kai ni Sanka Shimashita

description.en:
Let's go to the offline meet-up with online gaming friends!

"MAKOTO" is a middle-aged man and newbie gamer who's excited for his offline meeting with "Ao", a veteran adventurer who has always been helping him out. However, the one who appeared for the meeting was... an elementary school boy!?

title.en: Saijaku na Boku wa "Kabenuke Bugs" de Nariagaru ~Kabe wo Surinuketara, Shokai Clear Houshuu wo Mugen Kaishuu Dekimashita!~

altTitles.ja: 最弱な僕は＜壁抜けバグ＞で成り上がる～壁をすり抜けたら、初回クリア報酬を無限回収できました！～

altTitles.en: The Evasion Skill Turns Into a “Wall Clip Bug” Under Specific Conditions! When I Clipped Through the Dungeon Wall, I Was Able To Collect An Infinite Amount of First-Time Clear Rewards and So My Stats Skyrocketed!

description.en:
In order to earn enough money for his sister, Henry set out to become an adventurer. Unfortunately, because his Disengage skill was considered useless and his stats were too low, many adventurers berated him and considered him incompetent. Even when he finally managed to join a party, he was quickly dismissed.

Out of desperation, Henry attempted a solo dive into a dungeon, and that was when he made a shocking discovery: Utilizing Disengage under specific circumstances would allow him to clip through walls. Once he clipped through the walls, he was able to bypass the dungeon boss monster and receive the clear reward. Not only that, he was able to collect the one-time clear reward an infinite number of times! By taking advantage of this loophole, Henry has the potential to grow at breakneck speeds!
description.ja: -壁抜けバグ-でレアアイテムゲットしまくり、ステータス爆上げしまくり！！　レアスキルで財宝とモンスター蠢く魅惑のダンジョンをガンガン踏破せよ！！　病弱な妹のためにお金を稼がなくてはいけない少年・アンリ。しかし、外れスキル-回避-しか持っていないせいで、パーティーのリーダー・ギジェルモから無能と蔑まれ荷物持ちをクビになってしまう。絶望の中、無謀にもソロでダンジョンに挑むアンリだったが、モンスターに襲われる中、-回避-スキルで壁をすり抜けられることに気が付き――！？　-回避-スキルで初回しか手に入れられないレアアイテムを無限回収し、底辺から成り上がれ！！

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
description.he: צ'יהירו הצעיר מבלה את ימיו באימונים תחת הדרכתו של אביו, מחשל החרבות המפורסם. יום אחד, הוא מקווה להפוך בעצמו ליצרן חרבות דגול. האב המשעשע והבן הרציני--הם חשבו שהימים האלו יימשכו לנצח. אבל לפתע, הטרגדיה מכה. יום אפל ספוג בדם. צ'יהירו וחרבו חיים כעת רק למען הנקמה.
description.ja: 刀匠を志す少年チヒロは、父の下で日々修行に励んでいた。おちゃらけた父と寡黙な息子。笑いの絶えない毎日がいつまでも続くと思っていたが…ある日悲劇が訪れる…。血塗られた絆と帰らない日常。少年は憎しみを焚べ、決意の炎を心に宿す…。
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

title.en: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai.

altTitles.ja: 数分後の未来が分かるようになったけど、女心は分からない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro ha Wakaranai.

altTitles.en: I Can Now See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Still Can't Understand a Woman's Heart.
I Can See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Don’t Know What a Woman's Mind Is Like

altTitles.id: Sekarang saya dapat melihat masa depan dalam beberapa menit, tetapi saya tidak dapat memahami hati seorang wanita.

altTitles.pt-br: Agora, posso ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas ainda não consigo entender o coração de uma mulher.

altTitles.vi: Tôi Giờ Có Thể Nhìn Thấy Vài Khắc Trong Tương Lai, Nhưng Vẫn Không Thể Hiểu Được Con Gái Nghĩ Gì

description.en: Arata Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arata doesn't realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.
description.id: Arase Itou bisa melihat beberapa menit ke depan. Namun, masa depan yang ia lihat selalu berhubungan dengan masalah. Arase yang baik hati berusaha menghindari masa depan yang tidak menyenangkan ini, namun pada akhirnya masalah tersebut tetap membuatnya membantu berbagai gadis dengan masalah mereka. Tanpa ia sadari, para gadis mulai menyukainya. Arase tidak menyadari bahwa, diam-diam, para gadis bersaing untuk memperebutkannya.
description.ja:
伊藤新世は数分後の未来が分かる。ただし視える未来は不幸につながるもの。
お人好しな新世はそんな不都合な未来を回避し、様々な悩みを持つ少女を助けることになる。
新世は知らない。いつの間にか、少女たちに好かれていることに。
新世は気づかない。人知れず、少女たちが争っていることに。
description.vi: Arata Itou có khả năng nhìn thấy trước vài phút trong tương lai, nhưng những hình ảnh cậu thấy luôn gắn liền với xui xẻo. Là một người tốt bụng, Arata quyết định tận dụng năng lực "bất tiện" này để giúp đỡ các cô gái đang gặp khó khăn và ngăn chặn những điều không may sẽ xảy ra với họ. Thế nhưng, cậu hoàn toàn không nhận ra rằng các cô gái ngày càng có tình cảm với mình. Càng không hay biết về những "cuộc chiến ngầm" giữa họ để giành lấy sự chú ý của cậu.
description.pt-br: Arata Itou tem a habilidade de ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas as visões que ele tem estão sempre ligadas a infortúnios. Com seu coração bondoso, Arata decide usar esse poder inconveniente para ajudar as garotas que enfrentam diversos problemas e evitar seus futuros infelizes. No entanto, Arata não percebe que, pouco a pouco, as garotas começam a se afeiçoar a ele. E ele continua alheio às rivalidades silenciosas que estão se formando entre elas por causa da sua atenção.

altTitles.ja: みだりに憑かせてはなりません

description.en: Tamotsu Sugawara, a corporate employee who can't say no to anything, finds himself unable to go to work and decides to recuperate for a while at his family's shrine. One night, a ghost that looks exactly like Makoto Hiiragi, a university student working part-time at the shrine during the day, appears before him. A horror-inspired romantic comedy linking a former "yes-man" corporate employee and a female university student suspected of being a living spirit (!?) ♡
description.id: Tamotsu Sugawara, seorang karyawan yang tidak bisa menolak permintaan apa pun, mendapati dirinya tidak bisa lagi pergi ke kantor dan memutuskan untuk beristirahat sementara di kuil keluarganya. Suatu malam, hantu yang sangat mirip dengan Makoto Hiiragi, seorang mahasiswi yang bekerja part time di kuil itu pada siang hari, muncul di hadapannya. Komedi romantis yang terinspirasi dari horor ini menghubungkan mantan karyawan yang ngga bisa bilang tidak (yes-man) dengan mahasiswi yang dicurigai sebagai arwah hidup (!?) ♡

altTitles.ja: きみのためのエデン

description.en:
"Please... Kiss Me"

The young man, Yuusei Hakozaki, carries the memory of being kidnapped and confined along with six girls during his childhood. One day, as an adult leading a peaceful life, a girl suddenly appears before him and demands a kiss...!?

Yuusei is told of a single "rule": He must kiss the girls once every 24 hours. If he fails to do so, their heads will explode and they will die.

To save the girls from their deadly fate, Yuusei starts a communal life with them where he must "kiss them every day." In this closed-off miniature Eden, the story begins to unfold. Can Yuusei discern their lies and truths and find his one destined partner?
description.id: "Tolong ― Cium Aku"Hakozaki Yuuki, seorang pemuda yang dihantui kenangan tentang penculikan dan penyekapan bersama enam gadis sewaktu kecil, menjalani kehidupan tenang dan biasa sebagai orang dewasa. Namun, ketenangannya hancur ketika salah satu gadis tersebut tiba-tiba muncul di depannya dan memintanya untuk menciumnya!Yuuki dihadapkan pada satu aturan mengerikan:Dia harus mencium setiap gadis itu sekali dalam 24 jam.Jika dia gagal melakukannya, kepala mereka akan meledak, menyebabkan kematian mereka.Bertekad untuk menyelamatkan mereka dari nasib tragis ini, Yuuki memulai hidup bersama dengan para gadis tersebut, dengan misi "mencium mereka setiap hari." Di tengah kehidupan bersama dalam dunia yang tertutup ini, cerita mulai terungkap.Di balik kebohongan dan kebenaran para gadis, Yuuki harus memahami perasaan mereka yang sebenarnya dan mengungkap rahasia masa lalu mereka. Bisakah dia menemukan satu-satunya takdir sejatinya?

altTitles.en: Till We Meet Again, My King

altTitles.ja: さよならまたね、僕の王1

description.en:
Zhang Li sees his beloved "stone statue" vanish before his eyes. Stricken with grief and remorse, he travels back in time and arrives in Elbis, a mythical ancient civilization that mysteriously perished.  At last, he encounters the "stone statue" again, only to find that he wasn't the old crybaby that clung to him every day, but a cold, ruthless "tyrant" instead. Will he be able to stay with him this time…?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/my_majesty)
description.uk: Просто на очах Джана Лі мила його серцю кам'яна статуя щезає у небутті. Сповнений горя та каяття, юнак мандрує в минуле та потрапляє до Айбіссу, стародавньої цивілізації, що, за легендами, загадково вгасла багато сторіч тому. Удруге стрівши кам'яну статую, він усвідомлює, що дурник-плаксій, який бігав за ним хвостиком, перетворився на байдужого й безжального “деспота”. Чи здатен він залишитись із ним цього разу?..

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

altTitles.ja: DRAGON BALL カラー版

description.en: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

title.en: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me

description.en: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...

title.en: Elf Tensei Kara no Cheat Kenkokuki

altTitles.ja: エルフ転生からのチート建国記

altTitles.en: From Elf Reincarnation to Cheat Kingdom Founding Chronicle

altTitles.pt-br: Da Reencarnação dos Elfos à Crônica da Fundação do Reino Cheat

description.en:
A genius magician, to fight against his fate to die a natural death from old age, grasped at the truth of magic to allow himself to reincarnate with a power he created himself. The cycle of reincarnation is repeated multiple times and in his 31st reincarnation, the magician became a boy named Syril who lives in a village of elves.   
  
However, that village is ruled by Humans, and the Elves are treated as cattle. After becoming 14 years old, Cyril, who regained his past knowledge and experience, stands up to help a girl, Lucie, who is his childhood friend. The story of the creation of an ideal country begins in that one village, a place where all races can coexist. Elves, Fox-girl, and various other Heroines.
description.ja: 天才魔術師が、記憶を残して輪廻転生する魔術を作り上げた。彼は転生を繰り返し、31周目の世界でエルフの村に住む少年シリルとなる。しかし、その村は人間によって支配され、エルフは日々虐げられていた。幼馴染の少女ルシエを救うため、あらゆる種族が共存する理想の国家を作ろうと、天才魔術師が今、立ち上がる!!
description.pt-br:
Um mago gênio, para lutar contra seu destino de morrer de morte natural de velhice, agarrou a verdade da magia para se permitir reencarnar com um poder que ele mesmo criou. O ciclo de reencarnação é repetido várias vezes e em sua 31ª reencarnação, o mago se tornou um menino chamado Syril que vive em uma vila de elfos.

No entanto, essa vila é governada por humanos, e os elfos são tratados como gado. Depois de completar 14 anos, Cyril, que recuperou seus conhecimentos e experiências do passado, se levanta para ajudar uma garota, Lucie, que é sua amiga de infância. A história da criação de um país ideal começa naquela aldeia, um lugar onde todas as raças podem coexistir. Elfos, Raposas e várias outras Heroínas

title.en: Reikoku Koutei wa Hitojichi Oujo wo Dekiai-chuu

altTitles.ja: 冷酷皇帝は人質王女を溺愛中　なぜかぬいぐるみになって抱かれています

altTitles.ja-ro: Reikoku Koutei wa Hitojichi Oujo wo Dekiai-chuu

altTitles.en: The Ruthless Emperor Is Doting on the Hostage Princess

description.en:
A heartwarming fantasy that is sure to heal!

Ferlina is married to the ruthless Emperor Valt as a hostage for peace.
However, an incident causes him to be possessed by an adorable stuffed animal!
And when his appearance is revealed to the emperor, she finds herself in a desperate situation... or so she thought.
description.ja:
癒され必至のハートフル・ファンタジー!

和平のための人質として冷酷皇帝ヴァルトに嫁いだフェルリナ。
だが、ある事件をきっかけになんと可愛らしい"ぬいぐるみ"に憑依してしまう!
そして、その姿が皇帝にバレてしまい絶体絶命の大ピンチ――かと思いきや…?

目が覚めるとぬいぐるみの姿に!?
癒され必至のハートフル・ファンタジー!

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en:
Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. 
Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. 
Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br:
Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. 
Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. 
Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: 惡の華

description.en:
Kasuga Takao is a boy who loves reading books, particularly Baudelaire's The Flowers of Evil. A girl at his school, Saeki Nanako, is his muse and his Venus, and he admires her from a distance. One day, he forgets his copy of The Flowers of Evil in the classroom and runs back alone to pick it up. In the classroom, he finds not only his book but Saeki's gym uniform. On a mad impulse, he steals it.  
  
Now everyone knows "some pervert" stole Saeki's uniform, and Kasuga is dying with shame and guilt. Furthermore, the weird, creepy, and friendless girl of the class, Nakamura, saw him take the uniform. Instead of revealing it was him, she recognizes his kindred deviant spirit and uses her knowledge to take control of his life. Will it be possible for Kasuga to get closer to Saeki, despite Nakamura's meddling and his dark secret? What exactly does Nakamura intend to do with him?


---
Official Release:
- [Indonesian release](https://elexmedia.id/produk/serial/aku%20no%20hana-kembang%20jahanam) by Level Comics as **Aku no Hana: Kembang Jahanam** (2023)
description.uk:
Такао Касуга це простий школяр, який любить читати книжки, в особливості збірку поезій Бодлера "Квіти Зла". Він трохи зневажає своїх однокласників за те, що вони не читають книжки, а також таємно закоханий в прекрасну і милу відмінницю Нанако Саекі. Але з ними в класі вчиться повна протилежність до неї, Сава Накамура, груба і замкнена дівчина, яка зневажає і ненавидить усіх навколо неї.  
  
Одного дня у житті Такао відбувається епізод, який назавжди змінює його життя. Побачивши у Такао споріднену душу, Накамура намагається розкрити справжнє єство Такао, хоче він того, чи ні.
description.es-la: Takao Kasuga es un niño solitario que pasa sus días inmerso en libros para escapar de su frustración con la vida. Su única fuente de alegría es la hermosa Saeki, a quien admira en secreto desde lejos. Sin embargo, la obsesión de Takao va demasiado lejos un día cuando, en un momento de locura emocional, él roba la ropa de gimnasio de la niña y se la lleva a casa con él. Peor aún, su terrible obra es vista por Sawa Nakamura, una misteriosa marginada que se sienta detrás de él en clase y amenaza con revelar el secreto del niño a menos que prometa celebrar un contrato con ella. Al principio, parece que Sawa solo quiere un poco de compañía, pero pronto queda claro que este "contrato" implica más que simples charlas por la tarde. De hecho, Takao está a punto de descubrir cuán peligroso es su vínculo con Sawa y cómo amenaza con destrozar todo, su vida, su amor e incluso su cordura, aparte.
description.pt-br: Takao Kasuga é um estudante do ensino médio insociável que adora livros; em particular, Les Fleurs du Mal, de Charles Baudelaire. Ele também tem uma queda pelo ídolo de sua classe, a doce Nanako Saeki. Em forte contraste com ela, Sawa Nakamura é uma garota insolente e desagradável que não tem nenhuma preocupação com a escola. Um dia, Takao esquece de levar seu livro para casa. Ele volta à escola para recuperá-lo, mas fica parado quando encontra as roupas de ginástica recém-usadas de Nanako caídas no chão. Um desejo estranho consome Takao e, como um pervertido perverso, ele os rouba. Aku no Hana é uma história convincente de amadurecimento, centrada nos pensamentos, sentimentos e relacionamentos de Takao, enquanto ele tenta viver uma vida normal com a culpa de seu crime que pesa sobre ele. Sawa, no entanto, que testemunhou o roubo de Takao, tem outros planos para ele ...

altTitles.ja: 見える子ちゃん

altTitles.de: Mieruko-chan - Die Geister, die mich riefen

altTitles.th: มิเอรุโกะจัง ใครว่าหนูเห็นผี

description.en:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and… ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
[Alt Raw (niconico Manga)](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)
description.ja: ある日突然、普通の人には見えない異形な存在が見えるようになってしまった「みこ」。彼女は彼らから逃げるでもなく、立ち向かうでもなく…精一杯シカトしつづける事に。
description.ru: Мико — старшеклассница, проклятая шестым чувством; у нее есть способность видеть призраков- Она пытается жить обычной жизнью, но трудно, когда призраки продолжают преследовать ее- Она также может видеть души людей, и она понимает, что люди — настоящие монстры.В один «прекрасный» день старшеклассница внезапно начала видеть призраков! Она не может от этого избавиться, но изо всех сил старается вести себя так, будто вообще их не видит. История девушки с шестым чувством начинается!
description.uk: В один “прекрасний” день старшокласниця раптово почала бачити привидів! Вона не може від цього позбутися, але з усіх сил намагається поводитися так, ніби взагалі їх не бачить.

altTitles.vi: Ta Trời Sinh Đã Là Nhân Vật Phản Diện

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ja: この世界において魔法とは生き物である。そして困難な試練を乗り越え、魔法を習得するハンターたちを人は「魔女」と呼ぶ。ある日、辺境の山奥で恐るべき王の魔法（キング・ウロロ）と最強の魔女が激闘を繰り広げていた。しかしそこへ、場違いな一人の少年が乱入する。彼の名はイチ。魔女とも魔法とも縁の無い山暮らしの狩人が世界の常識をひっくり返す！
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

title.en: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou wo Suru no wa Chotto Taihen

altTitles.ja: 現代社会で乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢をするのはちょっと大変

altTitles.ja-ro: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou o Suru no wa Chotto Taihen

altTitles.en: Modern Villainess: It’s Not Easy Building A Corporate Empire Before The Crash

altTitles.id: Tidak mudah membangun kerajaan perusahaan sebelum runtuh

description.en: In the tough times after the Japanese economic bubble burst, a career woman suffering through the aftermath reincarnates as Keikain Runa, the villainess of an otome game with a modern setting! However, not long after reincarnating, she realizes just how dire a situation her family is in due to the ongoing financial recession. Using knowledge from her previous life, Runa sets out to rescue her new family from crisis and stand against the tide of 'the times' that caused her past life to end in misery.
description.id:
Saya bereinkarnasi sebagai putri jahat dalam game otome berdasarkan dunia modern.

Tetapi karena ini adalah dunia modern, kehidupan lambat seorang penjahat memiliki banyak kesulitan, dan sejarah Jepang modern, sejarah ekonomi modern, dan ekonomi global menyerang karakter utama saat dia mencoba mengatur urusan rumah tangga.

Bertahanlah, penjahat! Jangan kalah, penjahat!

Ini adalah kisah tentang perjuangan Keikain Runa, seorang putri jahat yang melemparkan dirinya ke dalam pemalsuan sejarah dan perang uang, meninggalkan karakter utama dan target penangkapan untuk menjalani kehidupan yang lambat, dengan latar belakang Perang Dunia yang hilang , runtuhnya gelembung ekonomi, dan krisis keuangan yang mengancam.
description.ja:
バブル崩壊以降長く続く不況に沈む日本――。厳しい時代の中で不遇に喘ぐ女性が、失意のうちに命を落とした。しかし彼女の運命はそこで終わらず、目を覚ますと“現代”を舞台にした乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢・桂華院瑠奈に転生を果たす！時はバブル崩壊直後、転生からほどなくして生家が危機に瀕するも、前世の知識を駆使して平成の一大特需“ITバブル”に乗ることに成功。莫大な利益を手にした瑠奈は、破滅の運命を回避――したはずだった･･･。

「これは、私達が時代に行う復讐の物語よ」

altTitles.ja: ライドンキング

description.en: Alexander Purchinov is president for life of the country of Pursia, a country ruled by the strict influence of its government. Alexander always desires to be dominant and "ride" things, whether literally or figuratively. Now that he has already ridden his country, his next target is a fantasy world that has orcs, wyverns, and centaurs.
description.fr: Alexander Purchinov est le président à vie de la République de Purse, un pays où l’État règne d’une main de fer. Alexander a toujours aimé dominer les choses, et particulièrement « monter » les choses, que ce soit littéralement ou au sens figuré. Ayant monté tout ce qui pouvait l’être dans notre monde, quoi de mieux qu’un monde de fantasy où vivent orques, centaures et wyvernes pour assouvir ses désirs !
description.ja: 武術・格闘技の達人であり、強い男を尊ぶプルジア国民から絶大な支持を受けている男、プルジア共和国終身大統領アレクサンドル・プルチノフ。ある日、愛虎アスランにまたがり政務に向かう途中、テロリストの襲撃を受ける。テロリストは難なく返り討ちにした大統領だったが、この襲撃で起きたあることをきっかけに気を失ってしまう。目覚めた大統領の目の前に広がる光景、それは人間とモンスターが共生する異世界だった！
description.ru: Александр Плутинов — первый президент Республики Плудия, получившей совсем недавно независимость в результате упорной вооружённой борьбы. Господин Плутинов любит быть наездником, будь то животное, машина или даже страна. Но быть лидером страны, пусть даже с поддержкой большинства населения и красивой помощницей Натальей, непростая задача. Бесконечные договоры, встречи да конференции. А хочется залезть на что-то неведанное и невиданное, что-то сказочное… Вроде дракона.

altTitles.ja: 学園潜水艦隊マーメイドガールズ

description.en: In the manga's story, extra-terrestrial life known as Trench Walkers reveal themselves, emerging from the Antarctic, and walking on the sea floor. Their goal is to terraform the Earth to their liking, which involves raising the sea level by 70 meters, thus rendering Tokyo and many other population centers uninhabitable. They have also begun to change Earth's surface water into what they call Nectar, the "divine water." Those who are incompatible with Nectar have a high chance of death when imbibing it. However, there are girls who are found to be compatible with Nectar, and they are recruited to be marines in a fight against the Trench Walkers, boarding ships to do battle in a new deep sea front line. The story centers on Hiro Todoroki, who receives a message from an older sister, a marine supposedly missing in action. The message tells Hiro to find a formidable marine named Kiriri Tsunoba. Though lost and confused, Hiro heads to the Masakado Girls Academy Submarine Unit with the intent to join them.

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
人形の国

description.en: The 200,000 KM diameter artificial celestial body of APOSIMZ. Most of its volume is its core space, which is covered by a superstructural shell. Fifty centuries ago, the people who lost a war against the core lost their right to reside legitimately in APOSIMZ, and were left behind on the extremely cold surface. They face the spreading Frame disease and aggressive automatons which appear frequently on the ruins level. Yet even so, somehow people survive.
description.ja: 遺跡層におおわれた巨大人工天体「アポシムズ」。危険な「自動機械」や「人形病」に侵された者たちが彷徨う極寒の地表で暮らすエオ、ビコ、エスロー達は行軍訓練のさなか、強大なリベドア帝国の兵士に追われる不思議な少女を助ける。少女から託された「コード」と「七つの弾丸」、それは世界の運命を大きく変えるものだった……!!
description.pt:
O corpo celeste artificial de 200.000KM de diâmetro, APOSIMZ. A maior parte de seu volume se encontra no espaço de seu núcleo, que é coberto por um escudo de superestrutura. Cinquenta séculos atrás, as pessoas que perderam a guerra contra o núcleo, perderam o direito de residir legalmente em APOSIMZ e foram isoladas na superfície fria. Eles enfrentam propagação da doença dos Frames e autômatos agressivos que aparecem frequentemente no nível das ruínas. Mesmo assim, as pessoas sobrevivem.  


---

**Officially published:**  
- In english by [Kodansha](https://kodanshacomics.com/series/aposimz/) (Print version by [Vertical](http://www.vertical-comics.com/books/aposimz_01.php))  
- In french by [Glénat](https://www.glenat.com/seinen/aposimz-la-planete-des-marionnettes-tome-01-9782344028827) as "Aposimz la planète des marionnettes"  
- In italian by [Panini Comics](http://comics.panini.it/notizie/articolo/aposimz/)  
- In german by [Manga Cult](https://www.cross-cult.de/titel/aposimz-land-der-puppen-1.html) as "Aposimz - Land der Puppen"  
  
**Note:** The oneshot was also translated by Kodansha: [Link](https://kodanshacomics.com/chapter/aposimz-prologue/)
description.uk: Штучне космічне тіло АПОСІМЗ приблизно 120,000 км в діаметрі. Більшу частину його об'єму становить ядро, яке захищене надструктурною оболонкою. П'ятдесят сторіч тому люди, які зазнали поразки у війні проти ядра, втратили своє законне право знаходитися на АПОСІМЗ, і були змушені жити на крижаній поверхні. Вони зіштовхнулися з безщадною ляльковою хворобою та агресивними автоматонами, котрі постійно підіймаються з рівня руїн. І навіть так, людство змогло вижити.
description.pt-br: O corpo celeste artificial de 200.000KM de diâmetro, APOSIMZ. A maior parte de seu volume se encontra no espaço de seu núcleo, que é coberto por um escudo de superestrutura. Cinquenta séculos atrás, as pessoas que perderam a guerra contra o núcleo, perderam o direito de residir legalmente em APOSIMZ e foram isoladas na superfície fria. Eles enfrentam propagação da doença dos Frames e autômatos agressivos que aparecem frequentemente no nível das ruínas. Mesmo assim, as pessoas sobrevivem…

altTitles.ja: やぎさん郵便

description.en: University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.ja: 『崎枝君ってさ私のこと好き？』　憧れの漫画家・茜部アキラのもとでアシスタントとして働く崎枝コウキ。憧れが次第に恋心へと変わっていたある日、まさかの両想いであることがわかり、なんと二人は恋人同士に！　しかし、茜部先生は思った事を口にしちゃう上に照れ知らずで、コウキを褒め殺してくる！
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com naturalidade.

altTitles.ja: オトナを知りたい女友達
My Galpals are Cumming of Age

altTitles.en: My Galpal Wants An Adult Understanding
My Girl Friend Wants An Adult Understanding

description.en:
20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is… appreciating lewd vide*s. “I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs”. A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love…… However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place!

Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

“I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you……?”

Watch it together with your innocent galpal with an immoral atmosphere! A vid-life story where male desires are laid bare with a gal!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
description.ko:
바다에 빠져 실종된 후, 무인도에서 7년 만에 살아 돌아온 우영장의 좌충우돌 문명 적응기!
그의 몸은 단단한 근육질로 변했고 온갖 동물과의 의사소통은 물론, 특별한 능력까지 구사하며 사건사고가 끊이질 않는다.
과연 영장은 밀림보다 무섭다는 도시에서 살아남을 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: ショーハショーテン！

description.en: The manga centers on a high school student who sends material to programs and a former child actor. The two team up to become an aspiring comedian duo.
description.ja: お笑いのセンスはあれど、人前では緊張してしまう内気な少年・四十万畦道！かたやネタは作れずとも表現力はピカイチの元天才子役・東片太陽！生きてきた道も違えば、性格も違う高校1年生の2人だが、目指す目標は唯一つ“お笑いの頂点”!!

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

title.en: Kyou no Ohiru wa Nan desu ka?

altTitles.ja: きょうのお昼はなんですか？

description.en:
Hungry time is happy time! 

Yuzuru Okazaki, who works at a video game company, is a lonely company worker who is not good at socializing with others. His only bliss at the office is to eat his lunch box, which he makes by himself! One day, while he was having his usual happy lunch time, an intruder, Maria Sakaue, an idol of the PR department, came to ruin it. What's more, she is demanding that I give her my lunch box...?
description.ja:
腹ペコタイムは、幸せ時間！
ゲーム会社に勤める岡崎ユズルは、人付き合いが苦手なぼっち社畜。そんな彼の、会社での唯一の至福は、お昼に１人、自分で作った弁当を食べること！ある日、いつもの幸せランチタイムを過ごしていると、それをぶち壊す侵入者、広報部のアイドル・坂上マリアがやってきた。しかも彼の弁当を寄こせと迫り…？
